description: This version of the  Person Running emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported platform
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person running emoji with light skin tone captures dynamic motion with smooth, flowing lines and vibrant colors. The figure is rendered with Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges and a subtle glossy sheen, suggesting an energetic stride and a healthy glow. Realistic lighting emphasizes the muscular definition and the sense of forward momentum, making this emoji a perfect visual for expressing fitness, speed, activity, or the pursuit of a goal.
